title: Bloomberg Markets: Medallia Improving Customer Experience
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Medallia Improving Customer Experience
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Michael R Kourey Chief Financial Officer Medallia Discussing helping companies improve the customer experience through a software platform that connects everyone in the organization with the customer.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
